author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: Why couldn’t he have bought like NextDoor or Clubhouse instead?

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: And big ups to therapy, new medications, and purposely taking off a big chunk of time before this to prioritize mental health.

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: Big corporate America sucked my soul dry - especially after working remote for a year. I never thought I’d be so excited to be back in an office and around people at 8am, but I already had clothes picked out and lunch packed last night. #NewJobNewMe

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: Watched “My Octopus Teacher” last night and I’m still in mourning.

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: Why are people paying for Audible when Libby is FREE?! Utilize libraries people, your taxes are already funding it. Oligarchs like Bezos don’t need more money.

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: Petition to have episodes of SpongeBob, or the 2004 movie, shown at Ravinia with a live band playing the music. @RaviniaFestival

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: In my 30 years on this planet I’ve never once lost my voice from attending one of my family’s parties - and there’s A LOT of us, they’re very loud. Tonight I lost my voice from being at my neighbor’s small family Easter party for 6 hours. I’m super impressed.

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: Pentatonix is Kidz Bop for adults.

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: 30 is the year of lower back pain and lidocaine patches.

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: The Hamtaro theme song has been popping into my head multiple times a day for the last few weeks. I couldn’t tell you the last time I watched Hamtaro, but maybe I’ll take this as a sign from the universe to play a few episodes. https://t.co/fW9zej1qW2

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: One of my fave people appearing on two of my favorite podcasts and BOTH episodes were released today - the podcast gods have blessed us this afternoon. 😌

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: Wouldn’t it be cool if we could put our brains in like a jar of water at night? Just let it chill out and do it’s thing without it giving us nightmares or late night anxiety.

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: The grandparents from Malcolm in the Middle remind me of my own grandparents in almost every way, except mine weren’t Canadian. I swear to god they could have been the influences for these characters.

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: Can someone tell content creators that their hand doesn’t always need to be in the video when they’re talking to the camera? It looks like some Idle Hands shit. https://t.co/VwdooQssnO

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: I hope you’re doing well, Mrs. W ❤️

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: One of the best pieces of advice came from my 5th grade teacher back in ‘02 when she caught kids passing notes. She told our class “Don’t ever put anything in writing that you wouldn’t want read in open court.” I think of her when I see news of texts/emails being subpoenaed.

author: Mandy Patinkin’s Beard
text: Um so I feel like all current and former #AppleBuddies should be receiving additional compensation for INTENTIONAL wage theft since the CEO’s email leaked. The crumbs we got from the class action lawsuit ~10 years ago was pitiful and obviously corporate still doesn’t give a shit.
